16. **Game 30 (Row 16):** They won by 15 points (118 - 103).
17. **Game 31 (Row 17):** A 8-point victory (120 - 112).
18. **Game 32 (Row 18):** Another loss, so no margin.

From this analysis, the only game where they had a win margin of exactly 23 points was Game 16 in Row 2. I don't see any other games with a larger margin than that. So, the claim is correct because 23 points was indeed their largest win margin in December.
